title: Charger does not fit securely. When moving phone the charger tends to become loose and fall out.
content:
Hi all,

I have got a annoying problem nwith my pixel 2. The charger does not fit securely. When moving phone the charger tends to become loose and fall out.

I did take out the dust, but my charger still does not fit properly. I have the same issue with every charger... this is not a charger problem.

Thanks upfront for your help
